content: Librarians are on the front lines of what they call an urgent battle for intellectual freedom, facing threats of censorship fueled by hard-right politics and Christian nationalism that, in some areas, is backed by intimidation from local armed groups.
picture_title: Culture war in the stacks:Librarians marshal against rising book bans
picture_content: Facing smear campaigns and death threats, librarians are on the front lines of an urgent battle for intellectual freedom.

content: "The privacy labels are supposed to give you information about an appâ€™s data practices so you can make informed choices, but the study found the labels are close to useless."
